data.actual_result: Scrolling down will keep marking the channel as read every time it loads in new messages, even occasionally continuously marking the channel as read while you're not even scrolling
data.expected_result: Scrolling down while viewing older messages should not be marking the channel as read
data.short_description: While viewing older message and you have new unread messages, loading more messages by scroll down will mark the channel as read
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server with enough messages to scroll up so that you're viewing older ones - Scroll up and then have someone else send a new message - Scroll down until you reach the point where it loads new messages and observe the unread banner disappearing
